评论概述: Great fit and I love the fabric
评论详情: This is very classy. Not too showy, but stylish. It is not too tight.

The dress is cute but is completely see thru and the back has the same cut out detail as it is on the side. Also, in the photo on site, the design hits at the waist as to be flattering but once on, it’s right under the breast. Returning.

评论概述: LOOKS BETTER ON APP - SOME BUTTONS HAD DEFECTS IN THE SURFACE
评论详情: Style not expected as compared to how it was advertised versus in person, and some buttons had defects on them which I took a picture of. Fabric was nice and thick though but overall style looked better online.
Very thin material, see thru even before putting it on.

This was a surprise to me. The fabric was heavy and streched down. There was more weight pulling it down then to the sides. And a see through dress. For me it was uncomfortable just trying it on let alone wearing it out. Will not be keeping this one.

Fits nice...probably need to wear shapewear unless your comfortable with your rolls showing! Lol...I'm definitely not so I'll be adding my Spanx! I'm normally a 1x or 16 so I ordered a XL and it fits. The material is a thin sweater like material...perfect for spring or early summer.
Fit true to form. Buttons weren't as sturdy as desired but nonetheless, likely to buy again.
I got many compliments on this outfit. It was very comfortable to wear. I wore all day long. It looked cute with a pair of sneakers and a pair of sandals. Lightweight.
Stunning color Soft material Gorgeous I love it Great fit and look

The color was a great shade of pink so it really stood out. Wore it to a daytime movie premiere. Got lots of compliments. The dress fit well and hugged all the right curves. Although i did notice that it looked better in person than in pics. in the pics, it looked more lumpy.

评论详情: It doesn't come in the correct size, I'm a size S and the size that apparently came to me was S but that wasn't the case, it runs too big...it comes as an L
